title: Client won't respond?
body: Every time I open my client and get to the login screen, the client just freezes and stops responding. Is anyone else getting this or is it just me? And is there a fix?

replies.body:
Client freezes are most commonly related to a connection problem to the server. Most of the time, this is exacerbated by local settings on your network that cause your connection to drop intermittently. I suggest trying the steps inside of our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your crashing.
